name: Control V
author: Linus Rendahl

sections.description:
A simple and non-intrusive way to build page templates, linked content and shortcodes.
This plugin is primarily for developers to easily create site-specific templates that
clients or end-users of a theme can have easy access to.
sections.changelog:
1.08: Fix for image URL.
1.0.7: Added links for “Add New Template”.
1.0.6: Small CSS fix.
1.0.5: Added a Example Template on plugin activation.
1.0.4: Added a basic documentation page.
1.0.3: Fixed incorrect CPT being called in helper window.
1.0.2: Fix for another incorrect path.
1.0.1: Fix for incorrect enqueue paths.
